Title: Relates to the rights to contract for the burial of cremains in pet cemeteries and requiring notice relating thereto
Summary: Relates to the rights to contract for the burial of cremains in pet cemeteries; requires notice relating thereto.
LawCode: Add ยง750-vv, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the right to contract for the burial of cremains in pet cemeteries and requiring notice related thereto
